A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you were wondering how to destroy a franchise beloved by fans in one single movie\, then this movie is for you. This movie did what no other movie in the history of movies could not. This movie was so bad\, I cannot think of a single reason to go back and watch. I checked the time several times over the course of the movie to see how long it had been since the movie began. You would be better just walking out.
